DIA_Lea_Q102_Hello_09_01: Yeah. I guess so. Thanks, but... You better go before...
DIA_Lea_Q102_Hello_09_04: I think I already told you I don't talk to people like you!
DIA_Lea_Q102_Hello_15_05: I was just asking. You don't have to be mean.
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_02: How are you doing? HOW ARE YOU DOING?!
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_03: I'll tell you how I'm doing!
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_04: There are drooling, smelly, stinky drunkards at every turn. I've had enough of this place!
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_05: And the worst of them all is Rik. Just watch until he starts to make a move at me, but all he'll get from me is a solid kick in the jewels!
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_15_06: As far as I know, it won't be long before our problems with the locals are over.
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_07: Why, are you going to town? Maybe... You need a companion?
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_15_08: Not for now, but the Elder will keep us safe if we start working.
DIA_Lea_Q104_RikProblem_09_09: Me at work?! Maybe it's not such a bad idea, but... I'll never feel safe as long as that hog is staring at me!
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_15_01: Rik won't give you any more trouble.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_09_02: Thank you, but I'm afraid as soon as he airs out his mouth, everything will go back to normal.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_15_03: Then I'll convince him again, and this time I won't be so nice.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_09_05: I saw what you did to him. I thank you... but you've caused yourself a lot of problems.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_15_06: It's nothing. He was already starting to annoy me.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_09_07: You know, I... I've been thinking about what you said, and I'm ready to help with the work.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_09_08: If the Elder is able to keep us safe, he can count on me.
DIA_Lea_Q104_SolvedProblem_09_10: I'll go to him right away.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_01: Did you hear about the break-in at Kurt's house?
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_04: First I've heard of it, but I saw him at the inn quite recently. He was all nervous.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_05: He must have been pretty upset about the break-in.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_06: He ran behind the counter for something and left with Viktor.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_07: Did you see where they went?
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_08: I have no idea. It was late and starting to rain, and I only passed them on the way to the inn.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_09: Do you remember anything unusual about that night?
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_10: Actually, it was an evening like any other, well except maybe for that downpour.
DIA_Lea_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_09_11: I went for a walk, but as soon as it started pouring, I went back inside to warm up by the fireplace.
